thread.title: Obama and Trump plan to carpool to Inauguration - SFGate
thread.title_full: Obama and Trump plan to carpool to Inauguration - SFGate

title: Obama and Trump plan to carpool to Inauguration - SFGate
text:
"Inauguration Day Sidewalk Protest in the Peninsula" Jan. 20 12 p.m. - 1 p.m. El Camino Real This protest asks participants to line up along El Camino Real "in all cities from San Francisco to San Jose" to protest the Trump administration. Organizers ask that participants "follow traffic and pedestrian rules" and bring signs, if they so choose. "Inauguration Day Sidewalk Protest in the Peninsula" Jan. 20 12 p.m. - 1 p.m. El Camino Real This protest asks participants to line up along El Camino Real "in all cities from San Francisco to San Jose" to protest Photo: Michael Macor, The Chronicle Image 7 of 8 "Roadshow of Resistance: #Earth2Trump" Already underway The so-called roadshow against Trump started in Oakland and will visit 16 cities nationwide before arriving in DC for the inauguration. The roadshow aims to bring "national and local speakers, great musicians, and an opportunity to join a growing movement of resistance to all forms of oppression and all attacks on our environment." It's sponsored by the Center for Biological Diversity . "Roadshow of Resistance: #Earth2Trump" Already underway The so-called roadshow against Trump started in Oakland and will visit 16 cities nationwide before arriving in DC for the inauguration. The roadshow aims to Photo: Evan Vucci, Associated Press Image 8 of 8 Obama and Trump plan to carpool to Inauguration 1 / 8 Back to Gallery 
While Donald Trump has broken tradition in many ways, it looks like he's planning to keep the schedule fairly traditional on the morning of the inauguration. Trump and Obama are also set to meet at the White House before the ceremonies. Latest from the SFGATE homepage: Click below for the top news from around the Bay Area and beyond. Sign up for our newsletters to be the first to learn about breaking news and more. Go to 'Sign In' and 'Manage Profile' at the top of the page. NORTHERN CALIFORNIA STORMS
